title: Selfish

description.plain: Selfish is the lead single from Justin Timberlake’s sixth studio album, Everything I Thought It Was. In “Selfish”, a mid-tempo R&B song, Justin sings about loving someone to the point of jealousy.

embed_content: Read “Selfish” by Justin Timberlake on Genius
recording_location: Conway Recording Studios, Los Angeles, CA.

album.full_title: Everything I Thought It Was by Justin Timberlake
album.name: Everything I Thought It Was

body.plain: Selfish is the lead single from Justin Timberlake’s sixth studio album, Everything I Thought It Was. In “Selfish”, a mid-tempo R&B song, Justin sings about loving someone to the point of jealousy.
